item.title: Katie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Fairy tales are more than true: not because they tell us that dragons exist, but because they tell us that dragons can be beaten." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Without education, we are in a horrible and deadly danger of taking educated people seriously." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "There are no uninteresting things, only uninterested people." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "The true soldier fights not because he hates what is in front of him, but because he loves what is behind him." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G. K. Chesterton
item.description: "The word "good" has many meanings. For example, if a man were to shoot his grandmother at a range of five hundred yards, I should call him a good shot, but not necessarily a good man." -- G. K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "There are two ways to get enough. One is to continue to accumulate more and more. The other is to desire less." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "How you think when you lose determines how long it will be until you win." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Dear Sir: Regarding your article 'What's Wrong with the World?' I am. Yours truly," -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "One sees great things from the valley, only small things from the peak." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Angels can fly because they take themselves lightly." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "A dead thing goes with the stream, but only a living thing can go against it." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G. K. Chesterton
item.description: "There's a lot of difference between listening and hearing." -- G. K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "He may be mad, but there's method in his madness. There nearly always is method in madness. It's what drives men mad, being methodical." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of a readiness to die." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "We are all in the same boat, in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by G. K. Chesterton
item.description: "Men do not differ much about what things they will call evils; they differ enormously about what evils they will call excusable." -- G. K. Chesterton

item.title: Katie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Katie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Katie add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Katie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Katie add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Katie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Katie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Katie add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Katie add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Katie add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Katie add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
